about_the_game:
This pack will add Saigyouji Yuyuko and Konpaku Youmu to the game.

================================================================

Saigyouji Yuyuko

Dreaming Ghost

  • Primary attack: Release elegant butterflies as danmaku.
  • Secondary attack: Place a spirit, the spirit will release butterfly danmaku after being hit.
  • Bomb: Continous area-of-effect butterfly danmaku.
  • Dash: A normal dash.
  • Characteristic: Bury nearby enemies with massive amount of danmaku.

================================================================

Konpaku Youmu

Half-Human Half-Phantom Gardener

  • Primary attack: Hanrei releases a spiritual missile.
  • Secondary attack: Unleash Hanrei's energy, causing a combo of impact.
  • Bomb: Unseal Roukanken.
  • Dash: A normal dash.
  • Characteristic: Able to switch between long-range and melee mode to combat enemies strategically.

Konpaku Youmu
